MathURL and MathJax

08 Feb 2018

I love how I can add Math equations in Markdown using MathJax. Another tool that provides easy LaTeX translation is MathURL.

My template includes:

\begin{align} \label{a} f : \mathbb{R}^n \rightarrow \mathbb{R}^m \end{align} The equation \ref{a} states thatâ€¦
